14
15#include <config.h>
16
17#include <stdio.h>
18
19#include <isc/md.h>
20#include <isc/iterated_hash.h>
21#include <isc/util.h>
22
23int
24isc_iterated_hash(unsigned char *out,
25 const unsigned int hashalg, const int iterations,
26 const unsigned char *salt, const int saltlength,
27 const unsigned char *in, const int inlength)
28{
29 isc_md_t *md;
30 isc_result_t result;
31 int n = 0;
32 unsigned int outlength = 0;
33 size_t len;
34 const unsigned char *buf;
35
36 REQUIRE(out != NULL);
37
38 if (hashalg != 1) {
39 return (0);
40 }
41
42 if ((md = isc_md_new()) == NULL) {
43 return (0);
44 }
45
46 len = inlength;
47 buf = in;
48 do {
49 result = isc_md_init(md, ISC_MD_SHA1);
50 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
51 goto md_fail;
52 }
53 result = isc_md_update(md, buf, len);
54 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
55 goto md_fail;
56 }
57 result = isc_md_update(md, salt, saltlength);
58 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
59 goto md_fail;
60 }
61 result = isc_md_final(md, out, &outlength);
62 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
63 goto md_fail;
64 }
65 result = isc_md_reset(md);
66 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
67 goto md_fail;
68 }
69 buf = out;
70 len = outlength;
71 } while (n++ < iterations);
72
73 isc_md_free(md);
74
75 return (outlength);
76md_fail:
77 isc_md_free(md);
78 return (0);
79}
80#undef RETERR
81
